verses.verse: "Then it shall be, when <S%H3588><s%> you enter <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you as an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and you possess <S%H3423><s%> it and live <S%H3427><s%> in it,

that you shall take <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the produce <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in from your land <S%H776><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> [it] in a basket <S%H2935><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chooses <S%H977><s%> to establish <S%H7931><s%> His name. <S%H8034><s%>

"And you shall go <S%H935><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is in office at that time, <S%H3117><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'I declare <S%H5046><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> that I have entered <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers to give <S%H1><s%> us.'

"Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> from your hand <S%H3027><s%> and set <S%H5117><s%> it down <S%H5117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"And you shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> 'My father was a wandering Aramean, <S%H1><s%> and he went <S%H6><s%> down <S%H761><s%> to Egypt <S%H3381><s%> and sojourned <S%H3381><s%> there, <S%H4714><s%> few <S%H1481><s%> in number; <S%H8033><s%> but there <S%H4592><s%> he became <S%H4962><s%> a great, <S%H8033><s%> mighty <S%H1961><s%> and populous <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H6099><s%>
'And the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> treated <S%H7489><s%> us harshly <S%H7489><s%> and afflicted <S%H6031><s%> us, and imposed <S%H5414><s%> hard <S%H7186><s%> labor <S%H5656><s%> on us.

'Then we cried <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers, and the Lord <S%H1><s%> heard <S%H3068><s%> our voice <S%H8085><s%> and saw <S%H6963><s%> our affliction <S%H7200><s%> and our toil <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression; <S%H5999><s%>

and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> us out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> and with great <S%H1419><s%> terror <S%H4172><s%> and with signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders; <S%H4159><s%>

and He has brought <S%H935><s%> us to this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> and has given <S%H5414><s%> us this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey. <S%H1706><s%>

'And now <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have brought <S%H935><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> of the produce <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> hast given <S%H5414><s%> me.' And you shall set <S%H5117><s%> it down <S%H5117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%>

and you and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> and the alien <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H9185><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you and your household. <S%H1004><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you have finished <S%H3615><s%> paying <S%H6237><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing, <S%H4643><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> it to the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> to the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> to the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and to the widow, <S%H490><s%> that they may eat <S%H398><s%> in your towns, <S%H8179><s%> and be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

"And you shall say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> 'I have removed <S%H1197><s%> the sacred <S%H6944><s%> [portion] from [my] house, <S%H1004><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> it to the Levite <S%H3881><s%> and the alien, <S%H1616><s%> the orphan <S%H3490><s%> and the widow, <S%H490><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> Thy commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> me; I have not transgressed <S%H5674><s%> or forgotten <S%H7911><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of Thy commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

'I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> of it while mourning, <S%H205><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have I removed <S%H1197><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of it while I was unclean, <S%H2931><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> offered <S%H5414><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of it to the dead. <S%H4191><s%> I have listened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God; <S%H430><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that Thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> me.

'Look <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H8259><s%> from Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation, <S%H4583><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the ground <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> us, a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> as Thou didst swear <S%H7650><s%> to our fathers.'

"This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commands <S%H6680><s%> you to do <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances. <S%H4941><s%> You shall therefore be careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

"You have today <S%H3117><s%> declared <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to be your God, <S%H430><s%> and that you would walk <S%H1980><s%> in His ways <S%H1870><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> His statutes, <S%H2706><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and listen <S%H8085><s%> to His voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has today <S%H3117><s%> declared <S%H559><s%> you to be His people, <S%H5971><s%> a treasured <S%H5459><s%> possession, <S%H5459><s%> as He promised <S%H1696><s%> you, and that you should keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

and that He shall set <S%H5414><s%> you high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has made, <S%H6213><s%> for praise, <S%H8416><s%> fame, <S%H8034><s%> and honor; <S%H8597><s%> and that you shall be a consecrated <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as He has spoken. <S%H1696><s%> "
